mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.jylx AS "jylx", a.fukuanfang AS "fukuanfang", (select case when a.orderid is not null then name else a.fukuanfang end from member where wxopenid=a.fukuanfang limit 0,1) AS 'fukuanren', (select case when a.orderid is not null then mobile else a.fukuanfang end from member where wxopenid=a.fukuanfang limit 0,1) AS 'fukuanrenmobile', a.shoukuanfang AS "shoukuanfang", a.jyje AS "jyje", a.orderid AS "orderid", a.ordertype AS "ordertype", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO caiwu_liushui( id, jylx, fukuanfang, shoukuanfang, jyje, orderid, ordertype, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{jylx}, #{fukuanfang}, #{shoukuanfang}, #{jyje}, #{orderid}, #{ordertype}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE caiwu_liushui SET jylx = #{jylx}, fukuanfang = #{fukuanfang}, shoukuanfang = #{shoukuanfang}, jyje = #{jyje}, orderid = #{orderid}, ordertype = #{ordertype}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
